alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Osage County through 145 AM CDT... At 100 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Hardy to 6 miles northwest of Shidler to 2 miles south of Kaw City. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Shidler... Burbank... Elgin... Grainola... Foraker... Pearsonia... Southern Kaw Lake... Webb City... Apperson... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma.
